data.text: @justin_sitterly @nyphospital @sandykostas24p @AmericanCancer @katiecouric Most importantly, I hope you are well. I agree that this drop in age to start screening does not address the increase in early onset colorectal cancer we are witnessing but is a start in acknowledging this disease does not only affect those over 50.
@nyphospital @katiecouric @AmericanCancer @FeliceSchnoll Why do you associate your organization with katie couric a smoker on this issue? #smokingcausescancer https://t.co/VGcyQ3JrSL
